overview: STAXUS’s Spanish summer odyssey continues, with Dutch superstar, Kris Blent, joining Gabriel Angel and Ray Mannix for the international holiday of a lifetime. Ruben Bart, Josh Milk and Xavier Sibley are the all-too-accommodating hosts, whose only interest is get their visitors out of their pants so that they can enjoy all that foreign, uncut dick! Culminating in arguably the most outrageous scene that director, John Smith, has ever produced. Life on the Costa Brava has never looked so fucking hot and horny – or as drenched with spunk!
title: Sunny Daze
